verses.verse: Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came unto me, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Now, thou son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, wilt thou judge <S%H8199><s%>, wilt thou judge <S%H8199><s%> the bloody <S%H1818><s%> city <S%H5892><s%>? yea, thou shalt shew <S%H3045><s%> her all her abominations <S%H8441><s%>. judge: or, plead for bloody: Heb. city of bloods? shew her: Heb. make her know

Then say <S%H559><s%> thou, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>, The city <S%H5892><s%> sheddeth <S%H8210><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of it, that her time <S%H6256><s%> may come <S%H935><s%>, and maketh <S%H6213><s%> idols <S%H1544><s%> against herself to defile <S%H2930><s%> herself.

Thou art become guilty <S%H816><s%> in thy blood <S%H1818><s%> that thou hast shed <S%H8210><s%>; and hast defiled <S%H2930><s%> thyself in thine idols <S%H1544><s%> which thou hast made <S%H6213><s%>; and thou hast caused thy days <S%H3117><s%> to draw near <S%H7126><s%>, and art come <S%H935><s%> even unto thy years <S%H8141><s%>: therefore have I made <S%H5414><s%> thee a reproach <S%H2781><s%> unto the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, and a mocking <S%H7048><s%> to all countries <S%H776><s%>.

Those that be near <S%H7138><s%>, and those that be far <S%H7350><s%> from thee, shall mock <S%H7046><s%> thee, which art infamous <S%H2931><s%> <S%H8034><s%> and much <S%H7227><s%> vexed <S%H4103><s%>. infamous: Heb. polluted of name, much in vexation
Behold, the princes <S%H5387><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, every one <S%H376><s%> were in thee to their power <S%H2220><s%> to shed <S%H8210><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>. power: Heb. arm

In thee have they set light <S%H7043><s%> by father <S%H1><s%> and mother <S%H517><s%>: in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of thee have they dealt <S%H6213><s%> by oppression <S%H6233><s%> with the stranger <S%H1616><s%>: in thee have they vexed <S%H3238><s%> the fatherless <S%H3490><s%> and the widow <S%H490><s%>. oppression: or, deceit
Thou hast despised <S%H959><s%> mine holy things <S%H6944><s%>, and hast profaned <S%H2490><s%> my sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>.

In thee are men <S%H582><s%> that carry tales <S%H7400><s%> to shed <S%H8210><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>: and in thee they eat <S%H398><s%> upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%>: in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of thee they commit <S%H6213><s%> lewdness <S%H2154><s%>. that: Heb. of slanders
In thee have they discovered <S%H1540><s%> their fathers' <S%H1><s%> nakedness <S%H6172><s%>: in thee have they humbled <S%H6031><s%> her that was set apart <S%H5079><s%> for pollution <S%H2931><s%>.

And one <S%H376><s%> hath committed <S%H6213><s%> abomination <S%H8441><s%> with his neighbour's <S%H7453><s%> wife <S%H802><s%>; and another <S%H376><s%> hath lewdly <S%H2154><s%> defiled <S%H2930><s%> his daughter in law <S%H3618><s%>; and another <S%H376><s%> in thee hath humbled <S%H6031><s%> his sister <S%H269><s%>, his father's <S%H1><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%>. one: or, every one another: or, every one lewdly: or, by lewdness

In thee have they taken <S%H3947><s%> gifts <S%H7810><s%> to shed <S%H8210><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>; thou hast taken <S%H3947><s%> usury <S%H5392><s%> and increase <S%H8636><s%>, and thou hast greedily gained <S%H1214><s%> of thy neighbours <S%H7453><s%> by extortion <S%H6233><s%>, and hast forgotten <S%H7911><s%> me, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>.

Behold, therefore I have smitten <S%H5221><s%> mine hand <S%H3709><s%> at thy dishonest gain <S%H1215><s%> which thou hast made <S%H6213><s%>, and at thy blood <S%H1818><s%> which hath been in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of thee.

Can thine heart <S%H3820><s%> endure <S%H5975><s%>, or can thine hands <S%H3027><s%> be strong <S%H2388><s%>, in the days <S%H3117><s%> that I shall deal <S%H6213><s%> with thee? I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it, and will do <S%H6213><s%> it.

And I will scatter <S%H6327><s%> thee among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, and disperse <S%H2219><s%> thee in the countries <S%H776><s%>, and will consume <S%H8552><s%> thy filthiness <S%H2932><s%> out of thee.

And thou shalt take thine inheritance <S%H2490><s%> <S%H5157><s%> in thyself in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, and thou shalt know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>. shalt take: or, shalt be profaned
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came unto me, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> is to me become dross <S%H5509><s%>: all they are brass <S%H5178><s%>, and tin <S%H913><s%>, and iron <S%H1270><s%>, and lead <S%H5777><s%>, in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the furnace <S%H3564><s%>; they are even the dross <S%H5509><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>. dross of silver: Heb. drosses, etc

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Because ye are all become dross <S%H5509><s%>, behold, therefore I will gather <S%H6908><s%> you into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

As they gather <S%H6910><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%>, and brass <S%H5178><s%>, and iron <S%H1270><s%>, and lead <S%H5777><s%>, and tin <S%H913><s%>, into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the furnace <S%H3564><s%>, to blow <S%H5301><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%> upon it, to melt <S%H5413><s%> it; so will I gather <S%H6908><s%> you in mine anger <S%H639><s%> and in my fury <S%H2534><s%>, and I will leave <S%H3240><s%> you there, and melt <S%H5413><s%> you. As: Heb. According to the gathering
Yea, I will gather <S%H3664><s%> you, and blow <S%H5301><s%> upon you in the fire <S%H784><s%> of my wrath <S%H5678><s%>, and ye shall be melted <S%H5413><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> thereof.

As silver <S%H3701><s%> is melted <S%H2046><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the furnace <S%H3564><s%>, so shall ye be melted <S%H5413><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> thereof; and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have poured out <S%H8210><s%> my fury <S%H2534><s%> upon you.
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came unto me, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, say <S%H559><s%> unto her, Thou art the land <S%H776><s%> that is not cleansed <S%H2891><s%>, nor rained <S%H1656><s%> upon in the day <S%H3117><s%> of indignation <S%H2195><s%>.

There is a conspiracy <S%H7195><s%> of her prophets <S%H5030><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> thereof, like a roaring <S%H7580><s%> lion <S%H738><s%> ravening <S%H2963><s%> the prey <S%H2964><s%>; they have devoured <S%H398><s%> souls <S%H5315><s%>; they have taken <S%H3947><s%> the treasure <S%H2633><s%> and precious things <S%H3366><s%>; they have made her many <S%H7235><s%> widows <S%H490><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> thereof.

Her priests <S%H3548><s%> have violated <S%H2554><s%> my law <S%H8451><s%>, and have profaned <S%H2490><s%> mine holy things <S%H6944><s%>: they have put no difference <S%H914><s%> between the holy <S%H6944><s%> and profane <S%H2455><s%>, neither have they shewed <S%H3045><s%> difference between the unclean <S%H2931><s%> and the clean <S%H2889><s%>, and have hid <S%H5956><s%> their eyes <S%H5869><s%> from my sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>, and I am profaned <S%H2490><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them. violated: Heb. offered violence to

Her princes <S%H8269><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> thereof are like wolves <S%H2061><s%> ravening <S%H2963><s%> the prey <S%H2964><s%>, to shed <S%H8210><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>, and to destroy <S%H6><s%> souls <S%H5315><s%>, to get <S%H1214><s%> dishonest gain <S%H1215><s%>.

And her prophets <S%H5030><s%> have daubed <S%H2902><s%> them with untempered <S%H8602><s%> morter, seeing <S%H2374><s%> vanity <S%H7723><s%>, and divining <S%H7080><s%> lies <S%H3577><s%> unto them, saying <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>, when the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath not spoken <S%H1696><s%>.

The people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> have used oppression <S%H6231><s%> <S%H6233><s%>, and exercised <S%H1497><s%> robbery <S%H1498><s%>, and have vexed <S%H3238><s%> the poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy <S%H34><s%>: yea, they have oppressed <S%H6231><s%> the stranger <S%H1616><s%> wrongfully <S%H4941><s%>. oppression: or, deceit wrongfully: Heb. without right

And I sought <S%H1245><s%> for a man <S%H376><s%> among them, that should make up <S%H1443><s%> the hedge <S%H1447><s%>, and stand <S%H5975><s%> in the gap <S%H6556><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me for the land <S%H776><s%>, that I should not destroy <S%H7843><s%> it: but I found <S%H4672><s%> none.

Therefore have I poured out <S%H8210><s%> mine indignation <S%H2195><s%> upon them; I have consumed <S%H3615><s%> them with the fire <S%H784><s%> of my wrath <S%H5678><s%>: their own way <S%H1870><s%> have I recompensed <S%H5414><s%> upon their heads <S%H7218><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>.
